Articles.Content:
Hi all this happening to me while trying to update the game to the last versiÃƒÂ³n.-

Any solution?

rsync: read error: Software caused connection abort (113)

rsync error: error in rsync protocol data stream (code 12) at /home/lapo/package/rsync-3.0.9-1/src/rsync-3.0.9/io.c(764) [receiver=3.0.9]

rsync: writefd_unbuffered failed to write 4092 bytes to socket [generator]: No child processes (10)

rsync error: error in rsync protocol data stream (code 12) at /home/lapo/package/rsync-3.0.9-1/src/rsync-3.0.9/io.c(1532) [generator=3.0.9]

rsync exited with code 12: Error in rsync protocol data stream
Not sure why that's happening, but you can always circumvent the patcher entirely and download the new version directly from the KSP Store.
I can download the new version from the store ksp?

Yep. If you login to the store, you'll see a yellowish My Account button at the very top of the page. Click that, and you should see a list of purchases (unless you've bought KerbalEDU or Kerbalizer, you should only see KSP in that list). KSP should have a Download button next to it.
If you buy the KSP in store Kerbalizer thing is I did not want to lose my progress since the previous version etaba very advanced in career mode, but hey I'll have to start all over again.

xDDD "estaba".

I will answer you in spanish, since you seem to be talking ("estaba", "hechicero") in spanish and struggling with english. I think, though, that it's a bit rude to talk in a foreign language in a part of a forum devoted to english. Besides, an english answer may be more suitable to other users that have the same problem.

So the spanish answer will be in a spoiler at the end of a regular english message. Here it goes.

Seems you're asking what the Kerbalizer is? It's just another program that it's actually quite useless unless you want to give more money to the developers. There you can make a custom Kerbal, as in, putting a moustache and some clothes. But it cannot be imported into the game so, yes, useless.

You say you will lose your saves if you reinstall? Actually you don't have to, as long as you backup your saves (KSP Installation Directory/saves) and place them back to their directory when the problem is fixed.

Ã‚Â¿Parece que preguntas quÃƒÂ© es el Kerbalizer? Es un programa extra que en realidad no sirve para nada, a no ser que quieras darle mÃƒÂ¡s dinero a los desarroladores del juego. Con ese programa puedes hacer un Kerbal personalizado, es decir, ponerle bigote y cambiarle la ropa y tal. Pero no se puede importar al juego, asÃƒÂ­ que sÃƒÂ­, no sirve para nada.

Ã‚Â¿Dices ademÃƒÂ¡s que vas a perder tu progreso si reinstalas? Pues en realidad no: basta con que guardes las partidas que ya tienes (Directorio de InstalaciÃƒÂ³n de KSP/saves) y las vuelvas a colocar en su sitio cuando arregles el problema.

You're right if I speak Spanish and I'll fatal with English since I use google translator but not 100% reliable with respect to what I asked ksp Store downloaded version 0.25 of 32-bit and me is phenomenal, and this solved the problem and did not lose anything saved games so thank you very much for your help !!!! colleague

Happy shooting and interstellar flight!

P.D: No se como poner el spoiler de espaÃƒÂ±ol jejej

Let's keep the Spanish in the Spanish forum. There are people who help out there, too.

The last time I looked into computer translation accuracy, Google Translate only maintained about 60% of the original meaning for related languages like Spanish and English. Even beginning language learners can quickly do better.

Also, spoilers use this code: [noparse]

hidden text

[/noparse]

Which makes this:

hidden text

Well colleague but not my case, my English is very bad so if it were not for the translator would be impossible to communicate with people on the forum and technical support.
